website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy pool with all steel components. The price is high and the size is smaller than some soft-sided pools, but the sturdy materials are a huge plus.
cons: Some buyers have complained about the poorly written instructions

customer_reviews.title: but overall I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price.... the rails seem to be flimsy(especially when compared to the 25 year old one we took down.) but we were able to get it all put together. Time we'll tell as to how many years we will get out of it... but overall I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pool kit!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped FAST! Arrived well packaged and protected with not a scratch, dent or scuff. Very good quality with more than adequate instructions and tips. I'd recommend this company's products to anyone that wants a quality pool for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: AA9TJ

customer_reviews.title: COMPANY SUPPORTS PRODUCTS SOLD
customer_reviews.text: Initial difficulty with shipment and receiving. All parts received as shown. Company supportive, strong customer service and communicated problems. Quality pool, great for the price! Appreciated the tip of using vacuum with liner installation, that was cool. Would purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: geneok

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pool
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pool about a month ago and we love it
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: This merchandise isn't all it's cracked up to be.
customer_reviews.text: Won't buy anything else from this company...it's not worth the money or time at all. The installation was a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona McManus

customer_reviews.title: Materials top quality. Instructions wrote by an idiot. ...
customer_reviews.text: Materials top quality.Instructions wrote by an idiot.So cheap with materials couldn't send a few extra screws,had to buy some. Not a project for the faint at heart.Think twice......
customer_reviews.author: mel76

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete Pool
customer_reviews.text: Received only part of the pool, no side rails or top rails or any parts other than the metal side walls. No brackets, hardware or anything else. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Rayfield

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: All parts came as stated.. however, I did have to purchase the pump & filter separately..but the quality of this pool is far more behind what I expected..Btw, my kids love it🎯
customer_reviews.author: Prettyface22

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Just a great deal. We got it in the Winter at a better price. Couldn't be more happy. All parts present and undamaged. Would recommend a pump upgrade if you can. We also upgraded a liner with the savings. We added a deck ( liner change accessible) and a platform on the opposite side for easier vacuuming. Note says size 15ft. We got the 18ft!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get the pop yet to write a review
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this pool today does it come with everything like the water pump and the ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Cornelius Aquarian Phoenix 24' x 52" Round Frame Above Ground Swimming Pool, No Liner
product_meta.description: Size:24 x 4.3 feetGet outdoors and have some fun in the sun this summer with the Phoenix pool series. This pool is 24 feet round and 4.3 feet deep so it provides fun for all ages. The pool's all steel construction provides durability for years of hassle-free use and the sharp marble wall design adds an appealing feature to your yard. The steel pool frame is easy to assemble so you can be ready for fun in a matter of minutes. No liner included (pool walls only). Don't miss out on the fun you could be having with your family and friends this summer and add the Phoenix pool to your backyard party. **Listing is for the pool frame only. Liner, skimmer purchased separately**
feature_bullets: Relax after a long day in the soothing waters of this pool in the comfort of your own backyard
Round above-ground pool frame features a 24-foot diameter and is 52 inches deep
Designed with active families in mind for lasting strength and beauty
All components are made of steel for lasting durability
Easy to assemble with a simple household screwdriver

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars26 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
